name: ADClientError.Code
desc: The error codes that are passed from the attribution response to the completion handler.

items.name: case corruptResponse
items.desc: The response from the attribution server is corrupt.

items.name: case requestClientError
items.desc: The response from the attribution server has an HTTP 4xx status code.

items.name: case requestNetworkError
items.desc: The communication with the attribution server has a network error.

items.name: case requestServerError
items.desc: The response from the attribution server has an HTTP 5xx status code.

items.name: case trackingRestrictedOrDenied
items.desc: The user has a restricted status or has denied tracking for the calling app.

items.name: case missingData
items.desc: The downloaded app has a payload without enough data to perform an attribution check.

items.name: case unsupportedPlatform
items.desc: The system doesnâ€™t support the platform for the attribution API call.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The response from the attribution server has an unknown error.
